TopicTitle: Problems reentering the ship after EVA

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

first of all, I'm pretty new to Kerbal Space Pogram so maybe it's kind of a noob question: I'm playing the carrer mode and startet my first fly to Minmus. I did a few EVA's at earlier flights using the PPD-10 Hitchhiker Container. The ship flies with Probodobodyne OKTO. So my 4 kerbs are just in the PPD-10.

On the last flight I send a scientist outside, but after pressing B for reentering, I loose control over him: He stays outside and seems to be active for control, since there is no display for fuel/energy anymore, but pressing WASD just turns the ship. But pressing Space dont activate the next stage (the stage menu is missing aswell). I tried it several times but it happen always again (testing it at the launch pad works)

In conclusion I can't reenter him, I can't send other Kerbs outside (Hatch obstructed), but I also can't speed up time on the way to Minmus. 

Can anyone tell me what I'm doing wrong? I add a screenshot, maybe this helps you to help me^^ Thank you

 

I think I failed the screenshot...

Hi,

similar thing recently happened to me, too. I guess it's some kind of a bug, restarting the game should help (at least it did in my case).

Michal.don

Unfortunately it is a known bug. 

The most common time it seems to happen is if you EVA a Kerbal and then board him right away. If you move the Kerbal around on the ladder before boarding the bug seems not to happen. 

Pretty sure it is fixed in 1.2.

Its extremely possible that its connected with the fact you clipped the heatshield inside the decoupler. When correctly attached, the heatshield should have a fairing around it.

Edited October 7, 2016 by Kerbal101

@Kerbal101:

He didn't clip the heatshield into the decoupler. In reality, the heatshield has 2 attach nodes; one that doesn't let the shroud appear (top pic), and one that does.

So, the heatshield is not the problem.

@Wollknäuel You can just click on the Decoupler and then place it Lower, so that the shroud around Heatshield appears. My idea is that possibly when attached this way - the invisible shroud around heatshield shifts UP and invisibly blocks the door.

The craft is a simple file, its inside KSP directory:
"KSP/saves/yoursavegamename/ships/ (VAB or SPH)/*.craft"


You can upload it to the kerbalx.com website and share the link here. Registration is pretty easy.
